Package it.polimi.ingsw.resources.resourceSets

Class TransactionResourceSet

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.resources.resourceSets.TransactionResourceSet
Direct Known Subclasses:
ObtainableResourceSet, SpendableResourceSet
public abstract class TransactionResourceSet extends Object
TransactionResourceSet is a container for all the resources (including potentially faith points) that are being moved from a resource location to another one.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    TransactionResourceSet()
    The default constructor initializes resources to an empty ChoiceSet and converted to false
    TransactionResourceSet​(ChoiceResourceSet choiceResourceSet)
    This constructor initializes resources to a given ChoiceResourceSet

      The default constructor initializes resources to an empty ChoiceSet and converted to false

    • TransactionResourceSet

      public TransactionResourceSet​(ChoiceResourceSet choiceResourceSet) throws InvalidResourceSetException
      This constructor initializes resources to a given ChoiceResourceSet
      Parameters:
      choiceResourceSet - The ChoiceResourceSet to copy from
      Throws:
      InvalidResourceSetException - choiceResourceSet is null

  • Method Details

    • toConcrete

      public void toConcrete() throws NotConcreteException
      toConcrete converts resources to a ConcreteResourceSet If resources is already a ConcreteResourceSet, it will not be modified
      Throws:
      NotConcreteException - Not all choices have been made for the ChoiceResourceSet

    • getResourceSet

      public ResourceSet getResourceSet()
      getResourceSet returns a copy of resources
      Returns:

    • isConverted

      public boolean isConverted()
      isConverted checks whether resources is a ConcreteResourceSet
      Returns:
      true iff resources has already been converted to a ConcreteResourceSet
